msg.description: Any English sentence, meant as information for developers and implementers. Avoid displaying this to the users and especially do not expect thos messages to stay stable.

msg_localised.description: Optional localised message that can be displayed to the user if existing. The language can be set by in the request or will fallback to English.

id.description: The request uuid that can be used to identify and trace API calls.

host.description: Server host and protocol from which request was handled.

count.description: the length of the results array.

results.description: The envelope of items, that are usually objects. We are generally sending back arrays even if there was just one requested resource.

id.description: The uuid v4 that is generated on the API when a transaction is received. This id can be used for idempotency

created_at.description: The server creation time of this transaction.

channel.description: The channel of which this transaction originated from. Usually this is the API, but may be experimental implementations of other channels.

client_account.description: The Tillhub client account ID. Note: this will usually be a uuid v4, however you might receive a capitalised dash-stripped version of it, if you hold a legsacy account.

date_opening.description: A user defined [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) compliant date e.g. 2018-01-29T14:55:05.000Z. This is used to track local client time as oppsed to `created_at`, which is the time the server has received it. This is necessary for e.g. offline client, and is valid time in fiscal reports.

date_closing.description: A user defined [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) compliant date e.g. 2018-01-29T14:55:05.000Z. This is used to track local client time as oppsed to `created_at`, which is the time the server has received it. This is necessary for e.g. offline client, and is valid time in fiscal reports.

oneOf.description: A implementer defined identifier. This can be used for local resource matching and has no business implication.
Any string that a user wants to store to identify a balance, or wants to make it human readable.
The Tillhub branch number.
The Tillhub register number.
(MANDANT) The Tillhub client location ID.
(MANDANT) The Tillhub client number.
The Tillhub staff resource ID, that has conducted this balance. (used by temp staff)
The Tillhub staff (as cashier) resource ID, that has conducted this balance.
The Tillhub POS client ID, that was generated upon install, that has conducted this balance.
Any additional flat values.
Register face values.
Branch face values.
Cashier face values.
Count of transactions of type "sales"
The Tillhub balance resource ID of the last balance.
The last balance's `custom_id`, that usually fiscally referred to as the balance number.
Any arbitrary comment.
A container for storing arbitrary metadata. This might be altered by API.
Geospatial data of this transaction
A implementer defined identifier. This can be used for local resource matching and has no business implication.

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

amount_cash_begin.description: The cash amount in the register at date_opening.

amount_cash_calculated.description: The calculated cash amount in the register at date_closing.

amount_cash_counted.description: The counted cash amount in the register at date_closing.

amount_expenses.description: The total sum of expenses/deposits/bank transfers.

items.description: Revenues grouped by revenue accounts (and currencies if neccessary)

oneOf.description: A implementer defined identifier. This can be used for local resource matching and has no business implication.
The applicable Tillhub account e.g for this payment type.

name.description: The nomenclature for this item, which is fiscally required.

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

amount.description: The calculated amount by summing all revenues of that type included in that balance.

oneOf.description: Any additional flat values.
Account face values.
A container for storing arbitrary metadata. This might be altered by API.

items.description: Payments grouped by payment options (and currencies if neccessary - and, if indicated by e.g. card cisrcuits).

oneOf.description: A implementer defined identifier. This can be used for local resource matching and has no business implication.
The Tillhub payment option resource reference ID.
The applicable Tillhub account e.g for this payment type.
The applicable Tillhub account for the cash payment type used for change.
Any external reference to a cost center e.g. in enterprise environments.

name.description: The nomenclature for this item, which is fiscally required.

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

type.description: The payment option used as key

oneOf.description: Beyond payment option - payment options are further grouped by e.g. certain card circuits.

type.description: The payment field used as a secondary grouping key

items.description: A card circuit that is part of this grouping.

amount_calculated.description: The calculated amount by summing all payments of that type included in that balance.

amount_counted.description: The reported amount (by counting cash or accessing an external reference, e.g. terminal balance report).

amount_discrepancy.description: The discrepancy between amount_calculated and amount_counted.

amount_change.description: The cash amount that was handed back from the cashier as change for all payments included.

oneOf.description: Any additional flat values.
Account face values.
Change account face values.
A container for storing arbitrary metadata. This might be altered by API.

items.description: Taxes grouped by tax accounts (and currencies if neccessary)

oneOf.description: A implementer defined identifier. This can be used for local resource matching and has no business implication.
The applicable Tillhub account e.g for this payment type.

vat_rate.description: The VAT rate of this group. E.g. 0.19 for 19% German VAT.

name.description: The nomenclature for this item, which is fiscally required.

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

amount.description: The calculated amount by summing all taxes of that type included in that balance.

oneOf.description: Any custom ID.
Any additional flat values.
Account face values.
A container for storing arbitrary metadata. This might be altered by API.

items.description: Tips grouped by staff, account and tax (and currencies if neccessary)

oneOf.description: A implementer defined identifier. This can be used for local resource matching and has no business implication.
The applicable Tillhub stuff for this tip configuration.
The applicable Tillhub revenue account for this tip configuration.
The applicable Tillhub tax account for this tip configuration.

vat_rate.description: The VAT rate of this group. E.g. 0.19 for 19% German VAT.

oneOf.description: The applicable Tillhub product for this tip configuration.

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

amount.description: The amount by summing all tips for that configuration in that balance.

oneOf.description: Any custom ID.
The Tillhub branch location ID. If none is specified we will use the one from the transaction.
The Tillhub register location ID. If none is specified we will use the one from the transaction.
Any additional flat values.
Account face values.
Tax face values.
Product face values.
Product face values.
Salesman face values.
A container for storing arbitrary metadata. This might be altered by API.

items.description: Payments grouped by payment options (and currencies if neccessary - and, if indicated by e.g. card cisrcuits).

oneOf.description: A implementer defined identifier. This can be used for local resource matching and has no business implication.

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

items.description: Cash unit details pre e.g. 7 pieces of 10 Cents coins.

oneOf.description: The quantity of this unit.

value.description: The amount by summing all tips for that configuration in that balance.

insert_id.description: The sequential database insert ID. Consecutiveness is not guaranteed.

hashes.description: Hashes to check consistency of the data fields of this transactions that are hashable.

sha512_v0.description: The v0 implementation of the balance hash

block.description: The block this balance is stored in and its references.

previous.description: The previous balance on the server. Consecutiveness is server only. Stale offline balances are not accommodated here.
